      • find

        protected final java.util.List<java.awt.Rectangle> find(int[] colorSet)
        Returns a List of type Rectangle for all regions which which are comprised of the specified set, int[][], of 3-bit color values. This also require that the regions found must be over the threshold specified by regionThreshold.
        Parameters:
        colorSet -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        Rectangle, List

      • find

        protected final java.util.List<java.awt.Rectangle> find(int[] colorSet,
                                      Vision.Tolerance tolerance)
        Returns a List of type Rectangle for all regions which which are comprised of the specified set, int[][], of 3-bit color values. Each region must satisfy the verify(Rectangle) of the specified Vision.Tolerance interface.
        Parameters:
        colorSet -
        tolerance -
        Returns:
